biotools.summary: HLP is a server developed for predicting half-life of peptides in intestine like environment. It generates all possible mutants (single mutation at each position per cycle) for a peptide and predict/calculate half-life and physicochemical properties (e.g. charge, polarity, hydrophobicity, volume, pK) of mutant peptides.
